author: Sid D
comment: Looks awesome!  Was looking for a nice BMW watch face.. & I found the Best.. Like the "Ambient light " customisation options.. Also comes with background carbon /plain option.. Definitely recommend.. & Totally Worth it! Keep up the good work.. Looking forward to more updates & designs
title: The Best BMW watch face

author: Colin Szalai
comment: Just got the 2nd gen moto 360 and it doesnt fit the watch face correctly

author: Thomas Sweed
comment: I have this watch face on my gear s 2 and it looks great. I just downloaded it for my moto 2nd Gen and it is not centered.
title: Nice watch face

author: robert morrill
comment: Looks sweet with white background light very nice
title: Moto 360

author: John Sommerfeld
comment: Refunded because it doesn't fit... 2nd gen moto 360
title: Doesnt fit moto 360 2nd gen

author: jamal robertson
comment: Please add the weather to it
title: Bmw watch face

author: Yoan Hlebarov
comment: Not great. Doesn't centre on the watch and the size is a little too small to fill the screen. The watch face looks good but it would've been nice to have a different look for the always on option on the watch.
title: Moto 360 sport

author: James Lee
comment: Looks nice, but you see the black Moto 360 bar at the bottom on my LG. The author did not make the design completely circular for non-moto360 owners. Oh well.

reply.author: Gear O'Clock
reply.content: Hi there and thank you for your feedback. You're correct, that was an important thing we've missed. We're releasing an update this week. Stay tuned.

title: Not made for LG GWatch R

author: Steve Murray
comment: Downloaded to my huawei watch running wear 1.4. watch face was only using 2/3 of the screen. Might try again when I upgrade to 1.5
title: Didn't fit the screen

author: jeff briggs
comment: Nice looking but did not center on watch

author: Ivan Tsochev
comment: Don't display on the whole watch
